title: 'Game Of Thrones' And Not Saving The Best For Last
teaser: NPR's Eric Deggans has noticed a trend: shows that put their most exciting moments one or two episodes before the finale.
contentencoded:
With HBO’s Game of Thrones highly anticipated season finale coming up on Sunday, NPR’s Eric Deggans talks with Here & Now‘s Jeremy Hobson about the show and a trend he’s noticing: shows that put their most exciting moments one or two episodes before the finale to build buzz. Deggans also discusses Jerry Seinfeld’s recent comments about political correctness in comedy.

Guest

  • Eric Deggans, TV critic for NPR. He tweets @Deggans.
